definition: the treatment of disease, especially cancer, by exposure to a radioactive substance
details:
noun
- the treatment of disease, especially cancer, by exposure to a radioactive substance
= example: the treatment of disease, especially cancer, by exposure to a radioactive substance
= synonyms: radiotherapy
- the act of spreading outward from a central source
- a radial arrangement of nerve fibers connecting different parts of the brain
- the spread of a group of organisms into new habitats
- energy that is radiated or transmitted in the form of rays or waves or particles
- the spontaneous emission of a stream of particles or electromagnetic rays in nuclear decay
= synonyms: radioactivity
- syndrome resulting from exposure to ionizing radiation (e.g., exposure to radioactive chemicals or to nuclear explosions)
= synonyms: radiation sickness, radiation syndrome
